trans-unit.source: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service to create and manage manual backups, backup schedules, and backup retention.
trans-unit.target: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service to create and manage manual backups, backup schedules, and backup retention.

trans-unit.source: Use the StorSimple Manager service to manage backup policies
trans-unit.target: Use the StorSimple Manager service to manage backup policies

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how to use the StorSimple Manager service **Backup Policies** page to control backup processes and backup retention for your StorSimple volumes.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial explains how to use the StorSimple Manager service **Backup Policies** page to control backup processes and backup retention for your StorSimple volumes.

trans-unit.source: It also describes how to complete a manual backup.
trans-unit.target: It also describes how to complete a manual backup.

trans-unit.source: The **Backup Policies** page allows you to manage backup policies and schedule local and cloud snapshots.
trans-unit.target: The **Backup Policies** page allows you to manage backup policies and schedule local and cloud snapshots.

trans-unit.source: (Backup policies are used to configure backup schedules and backup retention for a collection of volumes.) Backup policies enable you to take a snapshot of multiple volumes simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: (Backup policies are used to configure backup schedules and backup retention for a collection of volumes.) Backup policies enable you to take a snapshot of multiple volumes simultaneously.

trans-unit.source: This means that the backups created by a backup policy will be crash-consistent copies.
trans-unit.target: This means that the backups created by a backup policy will be crash-consistent copies.

trans-unit.source: This page lists the backup policies, their types, the associated volumes, the number of backups retained, and the option to enable these policies.
trans-unit.target: This page lists the backup policies, their types, the associated volumes, the number of backups retained, and the option to enable these policies.

trans-unit.source: The **Backup Policies** page also allows you to filter the existing backup policies by one or more of the following fields:
trans-unit.target: The **Backup Policies** page also allows you to filter the existing backup policies by one or more of the following fields:

trans-unit.source: **Policy name** – The name associated with the policy.
trans-unit.target: **Policy name** – The name associated with the policy.

trans-unit.source: The different types of policies include:
trans-unit.target: The different types of policies include:

trans-unit.source: Scheduled policies, which are explicitly created by the user.
trans-unit.target: Scheduled policies, which are explicitly created by the user.

trans-unit.source: Automatic policies, which are created when the default backup for this volume option was enabled at the time of volume creation.
trans-unit.target: Automatic policies, which are created when the default backup for this volume option was enabled at the time of volume creation.

trans-unit.source: These policies are named as VolumeName_Default where Volume name refers to the name of the StorSimple volume configured by the user in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: These policies are named as VolumeName_Default where Volume name refers to the name of the StorSimple volume configured by the user in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: The automatic policies result in daily cloud snapshots beginning at 22:30 device time.
trans-unit.target: The automatic policies result in daily cloud snapshots beginning at 22:30 device time.

trans-unit.source: Imported policies, which were originally created in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: Imported policies, which were originally created in the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: These have a tag that describes the StorSimple Snapshot Manager host that the policies were imported from.
trans-unit.target: These have a tag that describes the StorSimple Snapshot Manager host that the policies were imported from.

trans-unit.source: **Volumes** – The volumes associated with the policy.
trans-unit.target: **Volumes** – The volumes associated with the policy.

trans-unit.source: All the volumes associated with a backup policy are grouped together when backups are created.
trans-unit.target: All the volumes associated with a backup policy are grouped together when backups are created.

trans-unit.source: **Last successful backup** – The date and time of the last successful backup that was taken with this policy.
trans-unit.target: **Last successful backup** – The date and time of the last successful backup that was taken with this policy.

trans-unit.source: **Next backup** – The date and time of the next scheduled backup that will be initiated by this policy.
trans-unit.target: **Next backup** – The date and time of the next scheduled backup that will be initiated by this policy.

trans-unit.source: **Schedules** – The number of schedules associated with the backup policy.
trans-unit.target: **Schedules** – The number of schedules associated with the backup policy.
